extendedInfo.description: Like being naughty? Have a blast with naughty Monkeys.Monkeys are known for their naughty & funny nature. Fashion Monkey Memory Match is a Free game for kids with naughty, angry & funny monkeys. Monkeys are dressed up in a fashionable way which makes this memory game more interesting.Try this amazing app to boost up your fashion sense and have a blast with monkeys in Fashion Monkey Memory Match.***FEATURES***â Easy Game play.â Three Difficulty levels to challenge your memory skills i.e Easy, Medium and Hard.â 5 addictive and amazing game stages.â Tic-Toc timer to challenge the speed at which your kids are playing.â Best flipping animations.â Scores at the end telling you how fast did you complete the level. The faster you complete the rack the more scores you earn.â Animated Splash Screen.â Colorful HD images.â Original tic-toc timer sound.***HOW TO PLAY***â Select the difficulty level from Easy, Medium and Hard.â Tap the play button to get started.â Start tapping the cards until you match them up in pairs.â Complete the matching quickly as the timer keeps on ticking.â Scores are displayed once the level is cleared.â Tap the next button & move to the next level.Hit titles include Annoyed Birds Memory Game, Family of ABC abc for kids, My 123 Coloring Book, Kids Coloring Studios, Fairy Princess Dress up, Angry Witch Memory Game, Talking about Dino World & Cupcake Coloring Book. ***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.
